name: VMwareTask
description: Deploy VM resources and manage their life cycle actions
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: vCenterConnection
inputs.label: vCenter Server Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: VMware vCenter Server connection to target for deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action to perform on the VMware Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: template
inputs.label: Template
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of the template to use for creating the virtual machines.

inputs.name: vmList
inputs.label: Virtual Machine Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of the virtual machines' names, like FabrikamWeb, FabrikamDB, FabrikamTest.

inputs.name: targetdc
inputs.label: Datacenter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Datacenter where the virtual machines are present or needs to be created.

inputs.name: computeType
inputs.label: Compute Resource Type
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the cluster, host or resource pool, where the virtual machines will be deployed.

inputs.name: hostname
inputs.label: Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the ESXi host for deploying the virtual machines.

inputs.name: clustername
inputs.label: Cluster Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the cluster for deploying the virtual machines.

inputs.name: resourcepoolname
inputs.label: Resource Pool Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the resource pool for deploying the virtual machines.

inputs.name: datastore
inputs.label: Datastore
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Datastore for storing the virtual machine's configuration and disk files.

inputs.name: customizationspec
inputs.label: Guest OS Customization Spec
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Guest OS Customization Specification. To keep hostname unique, set the VM name as the NetBIOS name.

inputs.name: snapshotName
inputs.label: Snapshot Name
inputs.visibleRule: action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Revert Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Delete Snapshot of Virtual Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the snapshot of the virtual machines.

inputs.name: snapshotMemory
inputs.label: Snapshot Memory
inputs.visibleRule: action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.visibleRule: action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a description for the action.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify wait time in seconds for the Virtual Machine to be in deployment ready state.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Power On Virtual Machines || action = Shutdown Virtual Machines || action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Revert Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template

inputs.name: skipca
inputs.label: Skip Certificate Authority Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to skip validating the authenticity of the VMware vCenter Server's certificate from a trusted certificate authority.
